SELECT A.TABLE_NAME , A.COLUMN_NAME , A.DATA_TYPE , A.DATA_LENGTH , ( SELECT NEW_COLUMN_NAME FROM EGMIS_TBL_INFO Z WHERE Z.NEW_TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME AND UPPER(Z.NEW_COLUMN_ID) = COLUMN_NAME ) AS COLUMN_COMMENT , ( SELECT PK FROM EGMIS_TBL_INFO Z WHERE Z.NEW_TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME AND UPPER(Z.NEW_COLUMN_ID) = COLUMN_NAME ) AS PK , ( SELECT COL_SEQ FROM EGMIS_TBL_INFO Z WHERE Z.NEW_TABLE_NAME = TABLE_NAME AND UPPER(Z.NEW_COLUMN_ID) = COLUMN_NAME ) AS COL_SEQ FROM All_TAB_COLUMNS A WHERE 1=1
AND A.TABLE_NAME = UPPER(#tableName#)
order by COL_SEQ
